points.title: Promise to inform you about data requests from governments

tosdr.tldr: This service informs users when their data is sought by the government, unless prohibited by law. With this knowledge, you have an opportunity to involve yourself if you think the request is unreasonable.

topics.name: Law and government requests
topics.subtitle: How do services deal with government requests?
topics.title: Law and government requests

tosdr.tldr: This service makes clear to their users what standards and rules law enforcement must follow when they seek access to sensitive user data.

points.title: They delete user logs after 2 weeks

tosdr.tldr: Sonic.net will not keep User logs longer than two weeks.
tosdr.case: logs are deleted after two weeks
